articles.author: Rajesh Prabhuswamy, America Hernandez
articles.title: TotalEnergies pauses business with Adani Group - Reuters
articles.description: French oil major TotalEnergies halted on Monday investments into Adani Group, after the Indian ports-to-power conglomerate was engulfed in a crisis over an alleged multi-million-dollar bribery scheme.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI/PARIS, Nov 25 (Reuters) - French oil major TotalEnergies (TTEF.PA)
